description:
Create songs with extensive MIDI and Audio editing capabilities

Anvil Studio ™ is a free Windows 10 / 8.x / 7 Program designed for people who want to:

• record music with MIDI and Audio equipment
• compose music for MIDI and Audio equipment
• sequence music with MIDI equipment
• play with music using a computer, and
• print sheet music from standard MIDI files with the optional Print-Sheet
  accessory.

With the free version, you can create an unlimited number of MIDI tracks, and
two one-minute audio tracks.
